name: CRUK Fundraising
snippet: The new fundraising platform created in-house by Cancer Research UK aims to provide a seamless, free and enjoyable way of creating Fundraising Pages.

name: Disasters Emergency Committee
snippet: The Moon Jamaica website started as a digital version of it's older brother, the Moon Jamaica guide book, as a way to easily keep the contents up-to-date and provide a pleasant experience for the users. It is also a booking website, listing all the hotels, rental car and events available in the guide book.
